alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 9:25PM EDT until June 26 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern New Castle County in northern Delaware... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 924 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bear, or near Newark, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Newark, Pennsville, Carneys Point, Elsmere, New Castle, Delaware City, Newport, Arden, Stanton, North Star, Glasgow, Bear, Talleyville, Wilmington Manor, Pike Creek, Ashland, Greenville, Delaware Memorial Bridge and Hockessin. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 0 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. In addition to large hail and damaging winds, frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
